General.Name: Iljeong Ind
General.Description: Iljeong Industrial Co.Ltd. provides car seat fabrics to automobile makers in Korea. Its moquette, tricot, woven, plush jacquard, jersey, single knit, and headliner fabrics are used in car seat fabrics, head linings, door trims, arms rests, and sun visors. The company also provides upholstery fabrics that are used in sofas and chairs in hotel and homes. Iljeong Industrial Co.Ltd. was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Ansan, South Korea.
